name: The Voice from the Well: The Velessar Saga
name_original: The Voice from the Well: The Velessar Saga
description:
Stranded in a foreign world, Jay must fight to reclaim his stolen memories as mysterious forces conspire!
The Voice from the Well: The Velessar Saga is an adaption of the improved first arc of the Velessar Saga. Set in a fantasy realm inspired by historical dark ages Scandinavia and filled with mystery.

The game follows soon-to-be seventh grader Jay, as he finds himself stranded in a dark forest. Mysterious forces are at play as he wakes up the next day only able to remember the events of the day before. Jay sets out to reclaim his lost memories!

Player choice

Choices made throughout the game will lead to alternate endings and new scenes. Each ending is a glimpse into what could have been and several are hints at future developments later in the Velessar Saga.

Fully voiced cast

The diverse cast of characters from The Voice from the Well has been brought to life with voice acting for each character! With an immersive soundtrack and sound effects, headphones are highly recommended!
